version_description: Spike Evo’s thorns are much sharper. Ouch!
Camo Evo's camouflage effect was improved. Now it’s nowhere to be found
The Ice Evo's temperature was lowered by 2 degrees
We forced Smog Evo to produce environment-friendly mist to fight the global warming!

A new unique way to resolve the stalemate games, rising water mechanic! Did you know Evos can’t swim?
Long-anticipated background music to keep your mental high during the battles!
Numerous game improvements and fixes.

A new unique way to resolve the stalemate games, rising water mechanic! Did you know Evos can’t swim?
Long-anticipated background music to keep your mental high during the battles!
Numerous game improvements and fixes.

Over 30 new missions are now available! Explore new ways to progress through the game with the Evo Pass!
We've also made many game improvements and fixes.

Please welcome the Artefacts — new powerful items that bring a new twist to the battles, more options to your strategies, and brand-new abilities to your Evos! Invoke supernatural powers like Levitation, Swimming or Sorcerer, or simply improve your Evos' stats!
Explore dozens of new Artefacts featured in this update to get your own winning combination!
